0CY.F.summary: Masi Agricola S.p.A. produces and distributes wines in Italy. The company also offers its wines to approximately 120 countries internationally. Masi Agricola S.p.A. was founded in 1772 and is based in Sant' Ambrogio Di Valpolicella, Italy.

2DO.F.summary: La Doria S.p.A., together with its subsidiaries, produces and markets food products in Italy, the United Kingdom, Japan, Australia and internationally. Its products include tomato-based products, fruit juices and beverages, vegetables, canned pasta, cooked pulses, baked beans, canned pulses, ready-made sauces, and carrots. The company sells its products under the La Doria, La Romanella, Vivi G, Cook Italia, Althea, and Bella Parma brand names through retailers and distribution chains. La Doria S.p.A. was founded in 1954 and is based in Angri, Italy.

58H.F.summary: Davide Campari-Milano N.V., together with its subsidiaries, markets and distributes alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages in the Americas, the Middle East, Africa, Europe, and the Asia-Pacific. It offers range of spirits categories, including aperitif, vodka, liqueurs, bitters, whisky, tequila, rum, gin, and cognac, as well as champagne and non-alcoholic aperitif under approximately 50 brands, such as Aperol, Campari, SKYY, Wild Turkey, Grand Marnier, Appleton Estate, Wray & Nephew Overproof, and other brands. The company was founded in 1860 and is headquartered in Sesto San Giovanni, Italy. Davide Campari-Milano N.V. is a subsidiary of Lagfin S.C.A., SociÃ©tÃ© en Commandite par Actions.

6NF.F.summary: Newlat Food S.p.A. operates in the agri-food sector in Italy and internationally. The company offers pasta, rusks, toast, milk, yogurt, butter, cheese, protein and gluten free products, and childhood products. It offers its products under the 3 GLOCKEN, ala, Birkel, Buitoni, Centrale del Latte, CICCARESE, Corticella, DELVERDE, Fior di Salento, Giglio, Guacci, GÃDO, Krokkis, Matese, Optimus, Pezzullo, Polenghi, and Torre in Pietra brands through direct deposits and dealers. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Reggio Emilia, Italy.

ABTG.MI.summary: Alfio Bardolla Training Group S.p.A. operates in the personal finance education industry in Italy. The company offers courses in the field of properties, Internet royalty, business and companies, and trading; and digital and online products, diaries, ebooks, videos, and games. It also provides The Wake Up Call workshop, which provides guidance to analyze personal financial situation and will lead to find the points that will transform the situation. The company is based in Milan, Italy.

BFG.MI.summary: B.F. S.p.A. engages in the cultivation and marketing of agricultural products in Italy. It offers pasta, rice, herbal teas, and legumes/cereals. The company markets its products under the Le Stagioni d'Italia brand. The company was incorporated in 2014 and is based in Jolanda di Savoia, Italy.

CLI.MI.summary: Centrale del Latte d'Italia S.p.A. produces and markets dairy products in Italy. The company offers fresh milk, high temperature pasteurized milk, long-life milk, cream, and yogurt. It also provides vegetable drinks, soy products, cheese, pasta, eggs, fresh salads, cured meat, kitchen-line products, desserts, and gluten-free products. The company was formerly known as Centrale del Latte di Torino & C. S.p.A. Centrale del Latte d'Italia S.p.A. was founded in 1950 and is based in Turin, Italy. As of July 30, 2020, Centrale del Latte d'Italia S.p.A. operates as subsidiary of Newlat Group S.A.

CPR.MI.summary: Davide Campari-Milano N.V., together with its subsidiaries, markets and distributes alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages in the Americas, the Middle East, Africa, Europe, and the Asia-Pacific. It offers range of spirits categories, including aperitif, vodka, liqueurs, bitters, whisky, tequila, rum, gin, and cognac, as well as champagne and non-alcoholic aperitif under approximately 50 brands, such as Aperol, Campari, SKYY, Wild Turkey, Grand Marnier, Appleton Estate, Wray & Nephew Overproof, and other brands. The company was founded in 1860 and is headquartered in Sesto San Giovanni, Italy. Davide Campari-Milano N.V. is a subsidiary of Lagfin S.C.A., SociÃ©tÃ© en Commandite par Actions.

DVDCF.summary: Davide Campari-Milano N.V., together with its subsidiaries, markets and distributes alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages in the Americas, the Middle East, Africa, Europe, and the Asia-Pacific. It offers range of spirits categories, including aperitif, vodka, liqueurs, bitters, whisky, tequila, rum, gin, and cognac, as well as champagne and non-alcoholic aperitif under approximately 50 brands, such as Aperol, Campari, SKYY, Wild Turkey, Grand Marnier, Appleton Estate, Wray & Nephew Overproof, and other brands. The company was founded in 1860 and is headquartered in Sesto San Giovanni, Italy. Davide Campari-Milano N.V. is a subsidiary of Lagfin S.C.A., SociÃ©tÃ© en Commandite par Actions.

EC.MI.summary: Euro Cosmetic S.p.A. develops and produces cosmetics on behalf of third parties in the areas of oral hygiene, skin care, personal deodorants, body cleansing, hair treatments, and perfumery. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Trenzano, Italy.

ENV.MI.summary: Enervit S.p.A. engages in the research, development, production, marketing, and export of sports food supplements and functional nutrition products in Italy. The company offers Enervit Sport, a line of food supplements for people practicing sports, as well as for muscle efficiency and recovery during and after exercise; EnerZona, a line of products primarily for mental and physical wellbeing; Enervit Protein that is used for health and diet products; and Enervit Gymline Muscle, a line of products for training athletes to develop muscles. It also exports its products to approximately 20 countries worldwide. The company was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Milan, Italy.

ESI.MI.summary: ESI S.p.A. engages in the renewable energy business primarily in Italy. The company's business covers engineering, procurement, and construction, as well as system integration activities. It focuses on various market segments, such as photovoltaic, off-grid, mini-grid, hybrid, and storage systems, as well as wind power plants. The company was founded in 2018 and is headquartered in Formello, Italy.

FED.MI.summary: Giorgio Fedon & Figli Spa designs, develops, produces, and sells eyeglass cases, custom and luxury packaging, and leather accessories worldwide. The company offers accessories for opticians, such as cases, reading glasses, microfiber cloths, and accessories for eyeglass maintenance; and packaging for luxury items, such as watches, jewelry, and accessories. It also provides designer cases for watches, jewelry, and accessories; and accessories for optician shops or chains, consortia, and associates. The company also offers its products through stores. Giorgio Fedon & Figli Spa was founded in 1919 and is headquartered in Alpago, Italy.

ITM.MI.summary: Italmobiliare S.p.A., an investment holding company, owns and manages a portfolio of equity and other investments in the financial and industrial sectors in Italy and internationally. The company develops and produces fresh food packaging products, such as rigid containers, PET, and polypropylene for various food applications; and provides various trading products comprising films, containers, machineries, and accessories for fresh food industry and retail applications. It also produces and distributes electricity through renewable sources. The company has 15 hydropower plants; and approximately 300 kilometers of transmission lines in Italy, as well as 2 wind farms with a total capacity of 18 MW in Bulgaria. It also manufactures and sells coffee capsules and pods through specialist shops, as well as online and mass merchandising channels. In addition, the company manages private equity funds; and manufactures and sells outdoor footwear and ski equipment under the Tecnica, Blizzard, Lowa, Moon Boot, Rollerblade, and Nordica brand names. Further, it designs, manufactures, and distributes locks; cylinders; padlocks; and related security and safety equipment, such as emergency exits devices and door closers. Additionally, the company engages in the distribution and sale of LPG; and real estate business. Italmobiliare S.p.A. was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Milan, Italy.

ITM1.F.summary: Italmobiliare S.p.A., an investment holding company, owns and manages a portfolio of equity and other investments in the financial and industrial sectors in Italy and internationally. The company develops and produces fresh food packaging products, such as rigid containers, PET, and polypropylene for various food applications; and provides various trading products comprising films, containers, machineries, and accessories for fresh food industry and retail applications. Additionally, the company engages in the distribution and sale of LPG; and real estate business. Italmobiliare S.p.A. was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Milan, Italy.

IWB.MI.summary: Italian Wine Brands S.p.A., together with its subsidiaries, produces and distributes Italian wines worldwide. The company sells its wine products primarily under the Giordano brand name through Web, mail, and tele-selling channels. It is also involved in the provision of food products, such as espresso coffee under the Italian Art CafÃ© brand name and extra virgin olive oil under the Terre dei Gigli brand name. Italian Wine Brands S.p.A. is based in Milan, Italy.

KI.MI.summary: Ki Group S.p.A. distributes organic, biodynamic, and natural products in Italy. It offers water, wine, juices, beverages, cereals, flours, grains, dressings, oils and sauces, sweeteners, jams and yeast, dried fruits, sweet and savory snacks, UHT milk, vegetable drinks, desserts, bread and substitutes, pasta, pet food and accessories, breakfast biscuits, bakery products, tea, herbal tea, coffee and alternatives, soups, legumes, and vegetables. The company also produces substitute vegetables, fresh organic meat, and cheese. It offers its products through approximately 4,500 natural food stores, health food stores, and pharmacies. The company was founded in 1974 and is based in Turin, Italy. KI Group S.p.A. is a subsidiary of Bioera S.p.A.

KIG.F.summary: Ki Group S.p.A. distributes organic, biodynamic, and natural products in Italy. It offers water, wine, juices, beverages, cereals, flours, grains, dressings, oils and sauces, sweeteners, jams and yeast, dried fruits, sweet and savory snacks, UHT milk, vegetable drinks, desserts, bread and substitutes, pasta, pet food and accessories, breakfast biscuits, bakery products, tea, herbal tea, coffee and alternatives, soups, legumes, and vegetables. The company also produces substitute vegetables, fresh organic meat, and cheese. It offers its products through approximately 4,500 natural food stores, health food stores, and pharmacies. The company was founded in 1974 and is based in Turin, Italy. KI Group S.p.A. is a subsidiary of Bioera S.p.A.

LD.MI.summary: La Doria S.p.A., together with its subsidiaries, produces and markets food products in Italy, the United Kingdom, Japan, Australia and internationally. Its products include tomato-based products, fruit juices and beverages, vegetables, canned pasta, cooked pulses, baked beans, canned pulses, ready-made sauces, and carrots. The company sells its products under the La Doria, La Romanella, Vivi G, Cook Italia, Althea, and Bella Parma brand names through retailers and distribution chains. La Doria S.p.A. was founded in 1954 and is based in Angri, Italy.

LON.MI.summary: Longino & Cardenal S.p.A. supplies catering services to hotels and restaurants in Italy and internationally. It offers seafood products; plancton Marino; meats and eggs; hams and salamis; cheeses and other dairy products; flowers, sprouts, and aromatic herbs; truffles and mushrooms; breads, pastas, rice, and pulses; salts, spices, and condiments; pastry products; and ethnic products and accessories, as well as champagnes and vodkas. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Pogliano Milanese, Italy.

M6Z.F.summary: MARR S.p.A. commercializes and distributes fresh, dried, and frozen food products for foodservice operators in Italy, the European Union, and internationally. It offers meat products, such as poultry, beef, horse meat mutton and lamb, game, pork, and veal products; seafood products, including fresh and saltwater fish, lobsters and scampi, squids, calamari and molluscs, shrimps, fillets, sliced and pre-prepared items, tails and prawns, and cuttlefishes and frozen octopuses. The company also provides grocery products comprising biscuits and sweets, chocolates and candies, preserved products, vegetable preserves, ice cream and pastries, honey, jams and spread creams, oil and vinegar, prepared and floury products, rice, pasta, pizza, salt, spices, sugar, coffee, tea, tisanes, sauces and seasoning, fruit s and vegetables, and gluten-free and organic products, as well as gastronomy services. In addition, it provides lard and shortening, milk, dairy products and cheese, cured meats, eggs and egg products, as well as specialty foodstuffs made from pork, beef, poultry and game; and beverages, liqueurs, and wines. Further, the company offers nonfood products, such as tablecloths and napkins, cleaning products and accessories, laundry products, and hygiene, dishwashing, handwashing, and disposable products; and table dishes, cutlery, glasses, induction pots and pans, knife sets, buffet assortment, and other kitchen products. Additionally, it offers various private label products. The company serves restaurants, fast food outlets, bars, hotels, resorts, canteens, chains operators, etc. It operates through a logistical-distribution network comprising 30 distribution centers, with 5 cash and carry stores, 4 agents with warehouses, and approximately 750 vehicles. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Rimini, Italy. MARR S.p.A. is a subsidiary of Cremonini S.p.A.

MARR.MI.summary: MARR S.p.A. commercializes and distributes fresh, dried, and frozen food products for foodservice operators in Italy, the European Union, and internationally. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Rimini, Italy. MARR S.p.A. is a subsidiary of Cremonini S.p.A.

MASI.MI.summary: Masi Agricola S.p.A. produces and distributes wines in Italy. The company also offers its wines to approximately 120 countries internationally. Masi Agricola S.p.A. was founded in 1772 and is based in Sant' Ambrogio Di Valpolicella, Italy.

NWL.MI.summary: Newlat Food S.p.A. operates in the agri-food sector in Italy and internationally. The company offers pasta, rusks, toast, milk, yogurt, butter, cheese, protein and gluten free products, and childhood products. It offers its products under the 3 GLOCKEN, ala, Birkel, Buitoni, Centrale del Latte, CICCARESE, Corticella, DELVERDE, Fior di Salento, Giglio, Guacci, GÃDO, Krokkis, Matese, Optimus, Pezzullo, Polenghi, and Torre in Pietra brands through direct deposits and dealers. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Reggio Emilia, Italy.

ORS.MI.summary: Orsero S.p.A. imports and distributes fruits and vegetables in Europe, Latin America, and North America. It also produces bananas and pineapples, citrus fruits, apples, melons, and pears, as well as exotic fruits and vegetables under the F.lli Orsero brand name. Orsero S.p.A. is headquartered in Milan, Italy.

VLS.MI.summary: Valsoia S.p.A produces, distributes, and markets mass consumption food products with a focus on health foods in Italy. It provides soya-based alternatives to drinks, ice creams, yogurts, desserts, biscuits, ready-meal dishes, cheeses and condiments, preserves and fruit products, and tomato purees and sauces, as well as wheat cereals and dietary supplement products. The company offers its products under the Valsoia BontÃ  E Salute, Naturattiva, Vitasoya, Santa Rosa, Pomodorissimo, Diete.Tic, BlueNyx, and Weetabix brands. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Bologna, Italy. Valsoia S.p.A is a subsidiary of Finsalute S.r.l.

WRG.F.summary: Orsero S.p.A. imports and distributes fruits and vegetables in Europe, Latin America, and North America. It also produces bananas and pineapples, citrus fruits, apples, melons, and pears, as well as exotic fruits and vegetables under the F.lli Orsero brand name. Orsero S.p.A. is headquartered in Milan, Italy.
